availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mahala McDowell McGarey in Lewis County, Kentucky, in February 1852. Father of Samantha A. McGarey, Mary F. McGarey, John W. McGarey, Frank McGarey, and Martin McGarey. Farmer in Greenup County in 1860. Employed Elizabeth McDowell as a servant in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup, p. 732.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 3, p. 80B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film 000344052, p. 118.
